    • Uses of WidgetExtension in com.communote.server.web.fe.widgets.extension

      Classes in com.communote.server.web.fe.widgets.extension with type parameters of type WidgetExtension 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  WidgetExtension<E extends WidgetExtension<E,M>,M extends WidgetExtensionManagement<E,M>>
      Marker interface for arbitrary extensions of the server side component of a widget.
      class  WidgetExtensionManagement<E extends WidgetExtension<E,M>,M extends WidgetExtensionManagement<E,M>>
      Class that manages a specific type of widget extensions.
      Methods in com.communote.server.web.fe.widgets.extension with type parameters of type WidgetExtension 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <E extends WidgetExtension<E,M>,M extends WidgetExtensionManagement<E,M>>

      Add a widget extension to a registered management.

    • Uses of WidgetExtension in com.communote.server.web.fe.widgets.extension.note

      Classes in com.communote.server.web.fe.widgets.extension.note that implement WidgetExtension 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CPLNoteActionsProvider
      Extension for the ChronologicalPostListWidget which allows adding or replacing actions of a note.
      class  CPLNoteItemTemplateProvider
      Extension for the ChronologicalPostList widget which provides means to render the HTML of a note with another template.
      class  CPLNoteMetaDataProvider
      Extension for the ChronologicalPostListWidget which allows adding meta-data to a note which should be available in the JavaScript frontend, for example in a NoteActionHandler or a note click handler.

    • Uses of WidgetExtension in com.communote.server.web.fe.widgets.type

      Classes in com.communote.server.web.fe.widgets.type that implement WidgetExtension 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ContentTypeWidgetExtension
      This class allows to add new content types to Communote, for instance "Video", "Image" or "Document".
